org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm

Class ADMMReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.ADMMReasoner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroundRuleStore, Reasoner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LatentTopicNetworkADMMReasoner

    public class ADMMReasoner
extends Object
implements Reasoner
    Uses an ADMM optimization method to optimize its GroundKernels.
    Author:
    Stephen Bach , Eric Norris

      • orderedGroundKernels

        protected Map<GroundRule,Integer> orderedGroundKernels
        Ordered list of GroundKernels for looking up indices in terms. The integer value corresponds to the index into terms.

      • terms

        protected List<ADMMObjectiveTerm> terms
        Ground kernels wrapped to be objective function terms for ADMM

      • variables

        protected org.apache.commons.collections4.BidiMap<Integer,AtomFunctionVariable> variables
        Collection of variables and their associated indices for looking up indices in z. We hold both a forward and reverse mapping.

      • changedGroundRule

        public void changedGroundRule(GroundRule gk)
        Description copied from interface: GroundRuleStore
        Notifies this store that a GroundRule was changed.

        Any component that modifies a GroundRule in this store should call this method.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundRule in interface GroundRuleStore
        Parameters:
        gk - the changed GroundRule

      • changedGroundKernelWeight

        public void changedGroundKernelWeight(WeightedGroundRule gk)
        Description copied from interface: GroundRuleStore
        Notifies this store that a WeightedGroundRule's weight was changed.

        This method should be called whenever the weight of a GroundCompatibilityKernel in this store is changed, or the weight of its parent WeightedRule is changed (and the GroundCompatibilityKernel's weight is still tied to it).

        It is not necessary to also call GroundRuleStore.changedGroundRule(GroundRule) if only the weight was changed.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernelWeight in interface GroundRuleStore
        Parameters:
        gk - the ground kernel with a changed weight

      • changedGroundKernelWeights

        public void changedGroundKernelWeights()
        Description copied from interface: GroundRuleStore
        Equivalent to calling GroundRuleStore.changedGroundKernelWeight(WeightedGroundRule) for all GroundCompatibilityKernels.
        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernelWeights in interface GroundRuleStore

      • optimize

        public void optimize()
        Description copied from interface: Reasoner
        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the this Reasoner's GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.
        Specified by:
        optimize in interface Reasoner
